actions.text: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 178 (Roll no. 378).
Amendment (A046) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 178 (Roll no. 378).

description: An amendment numbered 128 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit any funds from being expended by the Department of the Interior to conduct oil and gas pre-leasing, leasing, and related activities in outer continental shelf planning areas around Florida.
purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being expended by the Department of the Interior to conduct oil and gas pre-leasing, leasing, and related activities in outer continental shelf planning areas around Florida.
